<record_update table="sn_trendseeker_trend_detector_scripts">
    <sn_trendseeker_trend_detector_scripts action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <name>Lowest Value</name>
        <script><![CDATA[//Available variables:
//countArray - float array of historic count values for the rule (based on the rule's statistical window and amount of gathered history - not necessarily in chronological order)
//
//Result variable:
//answer - calculated threshold (integer or float)

/* Returns the lowest number in the value set */

var lilNum = countArray[0];
for (var i = 1; i < countArray.length; i++) {
	if (countArray[i] < lilNum)
		lilNum = countArray[i];
}
answer = lilNum;	]]></script>
